channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Indian Institute of Science on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: DisCEdit: Model Editing by Identifying Discriminative Components
item.description: DISCEDIT efficiently identifies and edits discriminative neural network components for structured pruning and class unlearning, achieving high sparsity and forgetting rates without needing training da…

item.title: Mitigating Biases in Blackbox Feature Extractors for Image Classification Tasks
item.description: Researchers propose a simple yet effective clustering-based adaptive margin loss to mitigate biases inherited by black-box feature extractors in image classification tasks.
